text: Fra Giovanni da Verona, Italian Olivetan monk, sculptor, architect, miniature painter and woodworker. (1457 - 1525) Fra Giovanni da Verona (c. 1457, Verona - 1525) was an Italian Olivetan monk, sculptor, architect, miniature painter and woodworker. He was active between the late 15th and early 16th centuries. title: Fra Giovanni da Verona
